title: Peerio
signupHeader: Messages and files. Simple and secure.
signupIntro:
Peerio is a simple and secure way to send messages, share files, and store documents online. Everything gets encrypted before being sent to cloud, so nobody but you and those you share with ever have access to your data.

Peerio is currently in Beta. See what this means.
loginFailedText: If you are using a device passcode, please try using your account passphrase instead.
infoAlertPassphrase: For stronger security, Peerio uses randomly generated passphrases. Your passphrase is the master key to your account! You are the sole owner of your passphrase, and your account's security depends on you remembering and protecting it. You will need it to login to your account on new devices. If you lose your passphrase, you will permanently lose access to your account. We recommend writing your passphrase down on paper, or storing it in a secure password manager.
infoAlertPassphraseNote: Don't worry, in a moment you will be able to set a shorter passcode for quick access on this device.
signupPassphraseConfirmText: Remember, you are the sole owner of this passphrase. If you lose your passphrase, we cannot reset or recover it and your account will be lost. If you have not stored your passphrase somewhere safe, please go back and do so before continuing.
errorText: Your request could not be completed.
registerAccountErrorText: Sorry, we could not register your account right now. Please restart Peerio and try again in a few minutes.
signupAccountConfirmationEmail: Please check your email for a Peerio account confirmation code and enter it below. If you do not see a message, please check your spam folder.
signupAccountConfirmationPhone: We've sent an SMS to the phone number you have provided with a confirmation code. Please make sure your phone number contains your country code as well as an area code.
signupConfirmationCodeExpiredText: Your confirmation code has expired. Please restart Peerio and try signing up again.
setAPeerioPIN: Set a passcode for this device?
signupPeerioPIN:
Peerio passcodes allow for quicker login on specific devices. Instead of entering your passphrase each time you login, you can set a shorter passcode that will only work on this device. You can set different passcodes from your different devices.

User-chosen passcodes tend to be less secure than Peerio's passphrases, so you should only set passcodes on devices you trust and use regularly.
accountRateLimitedText: This account is temporarily unavailable because it has made too many server requests. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
accountBlacklistedText: This account is temporarily suspended. In order to regain access, please contact Peerio support by at support@peerio.com.
welcomeToAccountText: Peerio lets you send messages securely, as well as store and manage your files and documents. Here's how you can get started.
welcomeToAccountList1: Add contacts by clicking on the Contacts tab. Once you've added contacts, sharing messages and files is easy.
welcomeToAccountList2: Start conversations by clicking the Compose Message button on the left. Conversations can include as many contacts as you like — and everything is encrypted end to end.
welcomeToAccountList3: Store your files on Peerio by clicking the Files tab. Your files will be encrypted and ready to access on your other devices or share with contacts.
welcomeToAccountListSearch: Peerio's search bar at the top of the window makes it easy to go through your messages, files, and contacts all in one swoop. Give it a shot!
filesSidebarUploadFileSubtitle: or drag and drop to upload
logoutConfirmText: Please make sure you do not have any unsaved data prior to logging out.
participantHasLeft: This participant has left the conversation.
newMessageErrorText: Your message could not be sent.
conversationHasNoFiles: No files have been shared in this conversation yet.
filesWillAppearHere: Files will be listed here for quick access.
messageCouldNotBeSentTo: Your message could not be sent to the following contacts:
messageDecryptedError: Your contact attempted to send a message, but it could not be properly received by your account.
removeConversationsText: Warning: You will no longer receive any future messages and files shared within the conversation.
newMessageRecipientsErrorText: Please enter at least one recipient to send your message.
noParticipantsLeft: There are no participants left in this conversation.
quotaErrorText: You do not have enough space in your Peerio account. Try deleting other files first, or upgrade your account to include more storage.
sizeErrorText: Peerio currently does not support files larger than 400MB.
removeFilesText: Files will be permanently deleted from your account, but will still be visible to users you've shared them with.
destroyFilesText: Files will be removed from your account and the accounts of anyone you have shared them with.
destroyFilesOwnerError: Can’t destroy files you don’t own
destroyFilesOwnerErrorText: Destroying files removes them from every account they have been shared with. Only a file's owner can do that. Try deleting the file instead.
fileUploadErrorText: Please verify your file upload settings, and try again.
dragAndDropUploadText: Your files will be encrypted and uploaded to your personal cloud.
downloadFileInfo: Your file will be saved to your default Downloads folder.
downloadFileDangerous: Warning: Do not open files unless you trust the sender.
downloadFileComplete: Your file has been successfully downloaded and decrypted.
avatarTooltip: User avatars allow you to verify the cryptographic identity of your contacts. If a contact's avatar changes, please contact them to verify it again before communicating with them over Peerio.
noContactsText: Select a contact, or get started by adding a friend.
acceptContactRequestText: Choose whether to allow this user to message you and share files with you securely over Peerio.
addContactInfoText: Sending messages and sharing files with your friends begins by adding them as contacts. If your friend is not a Peerio user, we'll try to send an invite to their address. You can add a user by specifying their username, email or mobile number.
addContactInfoAvatarText: Every Peerio user has a special avatar that identifies them. Think of it as their digital fingerprint. If a Peerio user's avatar changes, they may have changed their passphrase, or their account may have been compromised.
addContactRequestSentText: We've sent a contact request to the username you have entered.
addContactInviteSentText: We have sent an invitation to your contact.
addContactErrorText: We couldn't add this contact. Please double-check the information and try again.
removeContactText: This will prevent you from communicating with each other securely over Peerio. Are you sure?
removeContactSuccess: Your contact has been successfully removed.
removeContactError: We could not remove this contact right now. Please try again.
twoFactorAuthSetupText: Use your favorite authenticator app to scan the barcode below. Peerio recommends Google Authenticator for iPhone and Android. See how two-factor authentication works with Peerio.
twoFactorAuthInfoText: Two-factor authentication helps keep your account safe by requiring two different kinds of login information. Please enter the six-digit code from your mobile device to continue.
twoFactorAuthConfirm: After scanning the QR code, enter the six-digit code generated by your mobile phone to confirm setup.
twoFactorAuthIncorrectText: The code you have entered is incorrect. Please try again.
twoFactorAuthConfirmedText: From now on, you will be asked to enter a code from your mobile device when you login for the first time in a day, or from a new location. Please make sure you do not lose your mobile device.
twoFactorAuthCannotDisable: We could not disable two-factor authentication.
twoFactorAuthDisabledText: You can now log in using only your password. For enhanced security, consider turning two-factor authentication back on in the future.
subject: Subject
name: Name
couldNotConfirmAddress: Please double-check the confirmation code you entered.
couldNotAddAddress: We couldn't add this address. Please double-check it.
couldNotUpdateName: We couldn't update your name. Please try again.
confirmedLanguageText: Your new language will be available once you restart Peerio.
confirmedAddressText: Thank you for taking the time to confirm your new Peerio address.
deleteAccountText: Deleting your Peerio account will permanently destroy all your information, and you will not be able to reclaim this username in the future.
deleteAccountConfirmText: Are you sure? You will lose all your data and never be able to reclaim this username.
changePassphraseText: In case your passphrase gets compromised, Peerio will allow you to revoke your previous passphrase and set a new one. This feature is coming soon.
accountSettingsTwoFactorAuthText: Peerio can pair with your smartphone to provide additional account security.
receiveMessageNotifications: Send me message notifications to my primary address.
useSounds: Play a sound when I receive a new notification.
sendReadReceipts: Notify my contacts when I read their messages.
peerioPINUpdatedText: Your passcode for this device has been successfully updated.
peerioPINRemovedText: Passcodes assigned to this device have been destroyed.
updateAvailableText: A new update is available for Peerio! Updates bring cool new features, as well as reliability improvements. Would you like to update now?
updateAvailableCriticalText: A critical Peerio update is available. For your security, you may not proceed until you install the latest update.
TOFUNotMatchErrorText: Warning! Some of your contacts have changed their identities. Before communicating with them, please make sure to verify their Peerio avatar icon in their profile. The usernames are:
importContactsGoogle: Import your Google Contacts to Peerio
importContactsGoogleText: To get your Google contacts on Peerio, simply login to your Gmail account and follow these steps:
importContactsGoogleStep1: Click Gmail at the top-left corner of your Gmail page, then choose Contacts.
importContactsGoogleStep3: Choose whether to export all contacts or only one group.
importContactsGoogleStep4: Select the Google CSV format for exporting your contacts.
importContactsGoogleStep5: After you have exported your contacts into a CSV file, click the button below to upload it to Peerio.
importContactsConfirm: Peerio may send invites on your behalf
importContactsConfirmText: If you proceed, Peerio may send invitations on your behalf to contacts that are not yet on Peerio. Are you sure you want to send invites to these contacts?
importContactsErrorText: We could not invite your contacts at this time. Please verify your information and try again.
importContactsSuccessText: Your contacts will be invited on your behalf.
importContactsSelectToInviteText: If a contact is already on Peerio, they will be added to your account. Otherwise, we will send them an invitation on your behalf.
creatingFolderError: Oops! Something went wrong and your folder was not created. Please try again.
renamingFolderError: Oops! Something went wrong and your folder was not renamed. Please try again.
removeFolderDialogText1: Are you sure you want to remove the folder
removeFolderDialogText2: Conversations in this folder will be moved to "inbox".
removingFolderError: Oops! Something went wrong and your folder was not removed. Please try again.
conversationMoveError: Failed to move conversation into folder.
moveConversationsDialogText: conversations selected. Move them into folder:
movingConversationsError: Sorry, failed to move conversations to folder
moveFilesDialogText: files selected. Move them into folder
movingFilesError: Sorry, failed to move files to folder
fileMoveError: Failed to move file into folder.
removeFileFolderDialogText2: Files in this folder are now in "all files".
